creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Collar, shaped, of embroidered black satin. The design, in shades of pale blue, green, and yellow includes cranes, cocks, spotted deer, grasshoppers, Hundred Antiques, and other symbols. Border of narrow white braid, banding of reseda green satin and binding of black satin. Lining of blue silk with figured ground.
title: Collar
